p:
Our paper uses the LSTM as the 2nd model. The input data for LSTM are the weekly search query frequency data obtained through GT. We use 26 weeks of GT data before each prediction point as predictors. We predicted the differences between the ground truth and the predicted values by the 1st model. In Eq (2), o
t denotes the predicted difference at time t. In Fig 2, we show the usage of LSTM mentioned above for our experiment; such usage is very similar to the method used in a previous study [ 12].
